entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is present in the scene with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and has tried to intervene on Buckbeak's behalf.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff that is scheduled for execution.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a wealthy pure-blood wizard and an enemy of Dumbledore.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is the executioner who will carry out Buckbeak's execution.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is present in the scene with Hagrid.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has tried to intervene on Buckbeak's behalf, but was unsuccessful.
Lucius Malfoy is friends with Macnair, the executioner.
Hagrid will be present at Buckbeak's execution.
Dumbledore has written to Hagrid, offering his support.
Hermione and Harry will stay with Hagrid during the execution.
